project_abstract.cdata: This project consists of: i) the rehabilitation of the northern half (160 km) of the Parakou-Malanville route; ii) the rehabilitation of the southern half (160 km) of the Parakou-Malanville route and of two sections (20 km) of the Cotonou-Bohicon road; iii) supervision by consultants of the rehabilitation mentioned in items (i) and (ii); and iv) extension of the existing highway maintenance program by providing additional technical assistance and materials.
